name: Mr. Mewsifer's Malevolent Market
description:
Mr. Mewsifer, a devilishly brilliant businesscat, has found out the perfect business model: hire someone, keep all their earnings or take their soul if they fail to make any. What could possibly go wrong? Oh, right, you're the employee, not Mr. Mewsifer.

Puzzle game made during Ludum Dare 44. Theme was "Your life is currency"!

The goal of the game is to find each customer the item they're looking for based on an increasing amount of hints. There are 12 food items (3 fruits, 3 veggies, 3 meats, 3 drinks) and 6 colors of each -- only the specific thing they're looking for will suffice!

Current build is submitted for LD44, but a separate build will be released in a few days with updates, tutorial, and a complete ending.

Controls (Keyboard) -
Movement: Arrow Keys
Confirm/Select: Z, Enter, Space

Controls (Mouse) -
Movement/Confirm/Select: Left-click

Controls (XBox 360 Controller) -
Movement: D-pad/Analog
Confirm/Select: A-button

Artist / Level & Sound Design - Shera Starr (@anocturnaldream)
